approveEditRecord.name: approveEditRecord
approveEditRecord.description: Approve the edit LicenseeClassPracticeGroup based on the request PK
approveEditRecord.queryString:
update Licenseeclasspracticegroup a

set a.effectiveFromDate = (select b.newEffectiveFromDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.effectiveToDate = (select b.newEffectiveToDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.isPrimary = (select b.newIsPrimary from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.classPracticeGroupFk  = (select b.newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)
approveEditRecord.countQueryString:
select count(*)  from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.effectiveToDate = (select b.newEffectiveToDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.isPrimary = (select b.newIsPrimary from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.classPracticeGroupFk  = (select b.newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

approvedNewRecord.name: approvedNewRecord
approvedNewRecord.description: Query to Insert a New record into LicenseeClassPracticeGroup on approval
approvedNewRecord.queryString:
INSERT INTO Licenseeclasspracticegroup (licenseeFk,isPrimary,effectiveFromDate,effectiveToDate,classPracticeGroupFk)

select licenseeFk,newIsPrimary,newEffectiveFromDate,newEffectiveToDate,newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals where pk =:primaryKey

getStatusChangeDetails.name: getStatusChangeDetails
getStatusChangeDetails.description: get Status Change Details Based on PersonID
getStatusChangeDetails.queryString: select classpraticegroup.classEntity.shortNameEnglish as Type,effectiveFromDate as EffectiveDate,effectiveToDate as EffectiveTo,CONCAT(classpraticegroup.practicegroup.code,' - ',classpraticegroup.practicegroup.shortNameEnglish) as PracticeGroup,isPrimary as isPrimary,revinfo.revtstmp as revtstmp from LicenseeclasspracticegroupAud where licensee.personFk=:personID
getStatusChangeDetails.countQueryString: select count(*)  from LicenseeclasspracticegroupAud where licensee.personFk=:personID

updateStatus.name: updateStatus
updateStatus.description: Update the Status after approving/rejecting a request
updateStatus.queryString: update RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP_APPROVALS set STATUS=:status where PK=:pk
